titleStmt.title: Immigrant Letter Collection of the University of Minnesota. Metadata in TEI format according to the current proposal of the Correspondence SIG

publicationStmt.p: Available under dual license CC-BY and BSD-2

sourceDesc.p: Born digital. Created via XSLT from a spreadsheet

ct:correspDesc.ct:placeSender: Dar es Salaam in "Deutsch-Ostafrika" (German colony until 1918), today Tanzania
